description: '''Chicago no wave''' was a music scene based in [[Chicago|Chicago, Illinois]] in the 1990s. The term was coined by [[Weasel Walter]] of [[the Flying Luttenbachers]] who, in the early-to-mid-1990s, began describing his bands and the bands they played with as "Chicago no wave"  in reference to [[New York City]] [[no wave]]. Other notable acts included [[The Scissor Girls|Scissor Girls]], [[U.S. Maple]], and [[Brise-Glace]].
